item.title: Democratic-led states sue to block Trump administration layoffs at the Education Department
item.description: A coalition of Democratic-led states is challenging the Trump administrationâ€™s layoffs across the Education Department, saying it amounts to an illegal dismantling of an agency created by Congress.
